text: Kurgashla () is a rural locality (a village) in Tashbukanovsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 280 as of 2010. There are 13 streets. == Geography == It is located 13 km from Krasnousolsky, 8.5 km from Nizhny Tashbukan. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Kurgashla
